message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_NAVIGATOR_CONCERN_ROLE
message.locale: Navigator concern role is mandatory for Navigator Links.

message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_ENTITY_ID
message.locale: An entity id is mandatory for Navigator Links.

message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_ENTITY_TYPE
message.locale: An entity type is mandatory for Navigator Links.

message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_USERNAME
message.locale: A related Citizen Workspace username is mandatory for Navigator Links.

message.name: ERR_XRV_WRONG_USER_TYPE_FOR_NAVIGATOR_LINK
message.locale: Navigator links can only be created for Citizen Workspace users. User %1s is not a CitizenWorkspace user.

message.name: ERR_XRV_WRONG_CONCERN_ROLE_TYPE_OR_STATUS
message.locale: Navigators must have the correct concern role and status.

message.name: ERR_XRV_NAVIGATOR_LINKED_TO_SAME_ENTITY_MULTIPLE_TIMES
message.locale: An attempt was made to link the same Navigator to the same Citizen Workspace process entity multiple times.

message.name: ERR_NAVIGATOR_UNSUPPORTED_TYPE
message.locale: An attempt was made to link a navigator to an unsupported Citizen Workspace process type.
